GlossaryTerm.TermName: stage II cancer of the uterus

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer that has spread to the cervix.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage II cancer of the uterus"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de útero en estadio II"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: cáncer de útero en estadio II

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer que se ha diseminado hacia el cuello del útero.
